newsitem.title: USA: Honeywell offer for Measurex begins.
newsitem.headline: Honeywell offer for Measurex begins.

text.p: Honeywell Inc said Friday its subsidiary Honeywell Acquisition Corp began a tender offer announced on January 27 for all outstanding shares of Measurex Corp at $35 a share in cash.
Also, as previously announced, any shares not purchased in the tender offer will be acquired by Honeywell in a subsequent merger at the same $35 cash price.

The offer requires, among other things, that a majority of the shares outstanding on a fully diluted basis be tendered. The deal also requires expiration of governmental waiting periods relating to acquisitions, and satisfactory completion of certain environmental tests.
The offer will expire at 1200 midnight EST, on February 28, 1997, unless the offer is extended.
Honeywell makes controls for residential, commercial and industrial buildings.
